name: Parts Fitment & Alternatives Agent
tagline: Finds the right part fast, with alternatives when needed
overview: The Parts Fitment & Alternatives Agent helps technicians and dealers quickly identify correct parts for service jobs. When primary parts aren't available, it suggests approved alternatives, supersessions, and kitsâ€”getting customers back on the road faster.
whatItDoes: Identifies correct parts based on equipment and application
Suggests alternatives when primary parts unavailable
Shows part supersessions and kit options
Checks real-time availability across distribution network
Provides fitment verification and compatibility checks
prompts: What injectors fit a 2019 X15 with EPA 2017 aftertreatment?
The primary part is backordered - what alternatives are available?
Has this part number been superseded?
Is there a kit that includes all the gaskets I need?
Can I use this part on both X15 and X12 applications?
outputs: Alternative part options ranked by availability
guardrails: Alternatives based on engineering-approved substitutions only
Safety-critical parts require explicit compatibility confirmation
Does not authorize warranty claims for alternative parts
Escalates uncertain fitments to parts specialists
whatsNext: Building proof of concept with parts distribution team. Defining integration with existing catalog systems.
